section.p: The following table lists the marks of some students.

Now apply a filter so that only the rows are displayed for students who have no rating or a mark 3 or lower. For this exercise, the table is kept small. For your solution, you should take much larger tables into account.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Select the cell mark and then tab Data Filter (group Sort & Filter) . Click on the arrow and choose Number Filters Custom Filter is less than or equal to and enter the number 3. Check the option Or and choose equals and left the number box blank. Click OK.
